title: US-Russia nuclear treaty nears expiry: Why New START matters for global security
summary_full: The world faces a dangerous new phase as the last US-Russia nuclear arms treaty, New START, is set to expire this week without a replacement. Russia warned of increased risks, noting its proposal for a one-year extension received no formal response from Washington.
